description: The user asks PropScout AI to arrange a viewing for a Portland townhouse on Friday at 2 PM. The assistant searches MLS listings, selects a suitable property, creates a calendar event, and emails both the listing agent and the user with the details.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. Use the available tools to find properties, calculate ROI, schedule viewings, and communicate with users and agents.
Can you set up a viewing for a townhouse in Portland on Friday at 2 PM?
Sure, I’ll look for a townhouse in Portland that fits your request and then schedule the viewing.

{"listings":[{"price":425000,"size_sqft":1450,"address":"2150 SW Oakridge Dr, Portland, OR 97201","url":"https://example-mls.com/listing/2150-sw-oakridge","agent_name":"Maria Lopez","agent_email":"mlopez@realtyco.com"},{"price":475000,"size_sqft":1580,"address":"3325 NE Cedar St, Portland, OR 97212","url":"https://example-mls.com/listing/3325-ne-cedar","agent_name":"James Patel","agent_email":"jpatel@housinghub.com"}]}

I found a townhouse that looks great:

**2150 SW Oakridge Dr, Portland, OR 97201**
- Price: $425,000
- Size: 1,450 sq ft
- Listing agent: Maria Lopez (mlopez@realtyco.com)

I’ll schedule a viewing for Friday at 2 PM and send a confirmation email to you and the agent.

arguments.subject: Viewing Scheduled: 2150 SW Oakridge Dr, Portland, OR
arguments.body:
Hello,

The viewing for the townhouse at **2150 SW Oakridge Dr, Portland, OR 97201** has been scheduled for **Friday, December 13, 2025 at 2:00 PM (Pacific Time)**. The appointment will last approximately 60 minutes.

A calendar invitation has been created and attached to this email.

Thank you,
PropScout AI

messages.content:
Your viewing is all set! 🎉

- **Property:** 2150 SW Oakridge Dr, Portland, OR 97201
- **Date & Time:** Friday, Dec 13 2025 at 2:00 PM (Pacific Time)
- **Duration:** 60 minutes
- **Calendar Link:** https://calendar.example.com/event/evt_abc123

An email confirmation has been sent to both you and the listing agent (Maria Lopez). Let me know if you need anything else, such as a rental analysis or nearby school information.
